shortDescription: Analysis of individual decision making, utility maximization, and demand.
Firm behavior, production functions, cost minimization, and supply.
Perfect competition, monopoly, oligopoly, and game theory.
GDP, GNP, circular flow, and measurement of economic activity.
Goods and money market equilibrium in the short run.
Random variables, probability distributions, expectation, and variance.
Unconstrained and constrained optimization, Lagrange multipliers.
Five Year Plans, 1991 reforms, agriculture and industry.
